name: Werewolf Tycoon Flash Game: Exe edition
name_original: Werewolf Tycoon Flash Game: Exe edition
description:
I DO NOT OWN WEREWOLF TYCOON!!! CREDIT GOES TO JOE WILLIAMSON

Since adobe flash player already ended back in December 31, 2020 and Werewolf Tycoon flash game edition is still unplayable on GameJolt. I decided to find the .swf file version of werewolf tycoon and convert the .swf file to a .exe file. Now you can play Werewolf Tycoon on PC!
